metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3044 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An excessively large PDF page size (found in fuzz testing, unlikely in normal PDF files) can result in a divide-by-zero in Xpdf's text extraction code. This is related to CVE-2022-30524, but the problem here is caused by a very large page size, rather than by a very large character coordinate.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
